akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6312. Transportation statistics annual report The Director shall submit to the President and Congress a transportation statistics annual report, which shall include—(1) information on the progress of the Director in carrying out the duties described in section 6302(b)(3)(B);
(2) documentation of the methods used to obtain and ensure the quality of the statistics presented in the report; and
(3) any recommendations of the Director for improving transportation statistical information.
(Added Pub. L. 112–141, div. E, title II, § 52011(a), July 6, 2012, 126 Stat. 894.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Oct. 1, 2012, see section 3(a) of Pub. L. 112–141, set out as an Effective and Termination Dates of 2012 Amendment note under section 101 of Title 23, Highways.
(1) information on the progress of the Director in carrying out the duties described in section 6302(b)(3)(B);
(2) documentation of the methods used to obtain and ensure the quality of the statistics presented in the report; and
(3) any recommendations of the Director for improving transportation statistical information.
